mapper.insert: insert into EXAMINER (ID, INSPECTOR1, INSPECTOR2, INSPECTOR3, CASE_IDï¼ŒTITLEONE,TITLETWO,TITLETHREE) values ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inspector1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inspector2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inspector3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{titleOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{titleTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{titleThree,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID, INSPECTOR1, INSPECTOR2, INSPECTOR3, CASE_ID FROM EXAMINER WHERE CASE_ID=#{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update EXAMINER set INSPECTOR1 = #{inspector1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSPECTOR2 = #{inspector2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSPECTOR3 = #{inspector3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLEONE = #{titleOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLETWO = #{titleTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLETHREE = #{titleThree,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
